data.claim: SuperAGI's Tool System allows agents to interact with external systems via toolkits. Available toolkits include: Slack, GitHub, Zapier, Instagram, Google Search, DuckDuckGo, file operations, code generation, email, and image generation. Tools can be extended with custom implementations.
data.snippet: Extensive tool integration, supporting applications from Slack and GitHub to Zapier and Instagram. Toolkits allow SuperAGI Agents to interact with third-party plugins and external systems.
